price: Hayır, sizin Rabbiniz göklerin ve yerin Rabbidir ki, onları O yaratmıştır. Ben de buna şahit olanlardanım.
arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal rabbukum rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alladhī faṭarahunna wa-anā ʿalā dhālikum mina al-shāhidīna
